00570                 static void threadUpdate()
00571                 {
00572                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00573                         {
00574                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._updateBuffers();
00575                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._processQueuedSounds();
00576                                 boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::millisec(10));
00577                         }
00578                 }
